description: This layer shows the location and designation of potential marine heritage sites in the WIO . This vector layer was adopted from the study "Assessing potential World Heritage marine sites in the Western Indian Ocean"
keywords: marine, heritage, Africa, East Africa, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mozambique, Reunion, Seychelles, Somalia, United Republic of Tanzania, Southern Africa, South Africa
name: WIO Potential Marine Heritage Sites
